title: How to Beat Master Hand in Super Smash Bros.

steps.headline: Go after him with strong aerial attacks.
When he uses the Bullet Bills, put your shield up or reflect them.
steps.description: If you're playing as Ness, you can also absorb them with PSI Magnet to heal yourself. This is useful if you have a high damage percentage.

steps.headline: When he "finger walks", try to roll past or shield.
When he flies at the stage, stand still.
steps.description: When he approaches with it, roll like crazy.

steps.headline: Ranged attacks work when he becomes aggressive.

text: Go after him with strong aerial attacks.  When he uses the Bullet Bills, put your shield up or reflect them. If you're playing as Ness, you can also absorb them with PSI Magnet to heal yourself. This is useful if you have a high damage percentage. When he "finger walks", try to roll past or shield.  When he flies at the stage, stand still. When he approaches with it, roll like crazy. Ranged attacks work when he becomes aggressive.  Repeat once more.
